price: 76. Markuu uga yimid Xaqu Xaggayaga, waxay yidhaahdeen: Kanu waa sixir cad.
arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡحَقُّ مِنۡ عِندِنَا قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَسِحۡرٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: falammā jāahumu al-ḥaqu min ʿindinā qālū inna hādhā lasiḥ'run mubīnun
